Class MassSpectra

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.jni.devices.MassSpectra
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Device, Sensor<Real>, Spectrometer
public class MassSpectra extends Object implements Spectrometer
Implementation of a Mass Spectrometer interacting via JNI.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
